channel.title: 'ProcessPicture'?
channel.description:
Ok, i fixed the proccespicture problem :) but now i have another problem....whenever i try and run it says ...
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\Skill\Woodcutting.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\Misc\PlayerForm.scar does not exist.
yea so and i put the srl folder in the includes folder so..i dunno wat else to do...sorry..im a noob at all this.. thanks for your help

item.title: 'ProcessPicture'?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

When your extracting the files, the excact file path sould be:
C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03\includes

Then be sure to move the plugins from C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03\includes\SRL\place inside plugins folder
to C:\Program Files\Scar 2.03\plugins

Read full topic

item.title: 'ProcessPicture'?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

You need to put your SRL folder into the Scar 2.03\Includes\ folder.

That way those .scar files will exist. Common sense? lol

Read full topic

item.title: 'ProcessPicture'?
item.dc:creator: @mister_p00n mister p00n
item.description:
@mister_p00n wrote:

I fixed that part now, but now i can’t get it to stop saying that…

Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL.scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\Skill\Woodcutting.scar does not exist.
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\Misc\PlayerForm.scar does not exist.

can some1 just walk me thru where i need to put all the SRL folders and evrything, all i no is that u put the “put this folder in the plugin folder” into the plugin folder…thanks

Read full topic

item.title: 'ProcessPicture'?
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

This question has been asked and answered hundreds of times. Well, I suppose at least you got it almost right. You’re meant to copy the files inside the folder into the plugins folder, not the folder itself.

Read full topic

item.title: 'ProcessPicture'?
item.dc:creator: @Coolnoob55 Coolnoob55
item.description:
@Coolnoob55 wrote:

Put all the plugins from SRL in the plugins folder

Read full topic
